mapper.select: SELECT `id`,`OrgCode`,`OrgName`,`ShortName`,`SpellName`,`OrgType`,`ProvinceCode`,`ProvinceName`,`CityCode`,`CityName`,`AreaCode`,`AreaName`,`Street`,`Address`,`SortNumber`,`Linker`,`LinkPhone`,`EnabledStatus`,`IsPublic`,`CreateDate`,`xuebu` from t_school_new where OrgName = #{value}
SELECT MIN(last_check_time) mincheckdate, max(last_check_time) maxcheckdate from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId}
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT count(*) ,xue_bu from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} GROUP BY school) a where a.xue_bu = #{xueBu}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi = 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing >= -0.5 and b.dengxiaoqiujing <= 0.75

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi = 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5 and b.dengxiaoqiujing > -3.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -3.25 and b.dengxiaoqiujing > -6.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -6.0
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi = 4.9

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi >=4.6 and a.jinshi <= 4.9
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi <= 4.5
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and xue_bu = #{xueBu} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5
SELECT count(*) from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and student_sex = #{studentSex} and school = #{school}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and student_sex = #{studentSex} and school = #{school} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5
select count(*) from t_result_eyesight_new where correction_farvision_od != 0 and activity_id = #{activityId}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and grade = #{grade} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0
SELECT count(*) from t_student_new where xue_bu = #{xueBu} and address = #{address} and date_format(last_check_time,'%Y') = #{lastCheckTime}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where xue_bu = #{xueBu} and address = #{address} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5 and date_format(b.last_check_time,'%Y') =#{lastCheckTime}
SELECT count(*) from t_student_new where student_sex = #{studentSex} and address = #{address} and date_format(last_check_time,'%Y') =#{lastCheckTime}

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT * ,LEAST(dengxiaoqiujingr,dengxiaoqiujingl) dengxiaoqiujing from ( SELECT * ,least(naked_farvision_od,naked_farvision_os) jinshi from t_student_new where student_sex = #{studentSex} and address = #{address} )a where a.jinshi < 5.0) b where b.dengxiaoqiujing < -0.5 and date_format(b.last_check_time,'%Y') =#{lastCheckTime}
